com.cyc.session.spi

Interface SessionApiService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CycApiEntryPoint

    public interface SessionApiService
extends CycApiEntryPoint
    The primary entrypoint for a Session API implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SessionManager getSessionManager()
      Returns the current SessionManager instance.
      SessionManager reloadSessionManager()
      Loads a new SessionManager with the default SessionManagerConfiguration.
      SessionManager reloadSessionManager(SessionManagerConfiguration configuration)
      Loads a new SessionManager, configured via the supplied SessionManagerConfiguration.

    • Method Detail

      • reloadSessionManager

        SessionManager reloadSessionManager(SessionManagerConfiguration configuration)
                             throws SessionServiceException,
                                    SessionManagerException,
                                    SessionManagerConfigurationException
        Loads a new SessionManager, configured via the supplied SessionManagerConfiguration. The previous SessionManager will be closed if it has not been closed already.
        Parameters:
        configuration -
        Returns:
        the new SessionManager
        Throws:
        SessionServiceException
        SessionManagerException
        SessionManagerConfigurationException
        See Also:
        reloadSessionManager()

      • reloadSessionManager

        SessionManager reloadSessionManager()
                             throws SessionServiceException,
                                    SessionManagerException,
                                    SessionManagerConfigurationException
        Loads a new SessionManager with the default SessionManagerConfiguration. The previous SessionManager will be closed if it has not been closed already.
        Returns:
        the new SessionManager
        Throws:
        SessionServiceException
        SessionManagerException
        SessionManagerConfigurationException
        See Also:
        #reloadSessionManager(com.cyc.session.manager.SessionManagerConfiguration)
